issue.title: Implementation status?
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11352](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11352). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://arrow.apache.org/docs/status.html says that the Rust implementation doesn't support anything except CSV R/W. Is that true?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11352?focusedCommentId=17270657) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Hi `[~domoritz]`, the support matrix has been updated, and will be visible in the next release (which is around the corner).

We initially didn't update the Rust column for the 2.0.0 release, because we were still busy with integration tests. Rest assured though, we support quite a lot of the list, you can see the latest version of the matrix at <https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/docs/source/status.rst.>

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11352?focusedCommentId=17270851) by Dominik Moritz (domoritz):*
Awesome. Looking forward to the updates. Keep up the great work.
